v0.9.0.2 - Baggage Train System & Formation Fixes
[NEW FEATURE: BAGGAGE TRAIN SYSTEM] - Added comprehensive baggage train availability system that tracks your company's logistics state - Baggage access depends on world situation: available in towns, camps, and when stationary - Unavailable during active combat, sieges, pursuits, or when traveling at speed - New Quartermaster dialogue options for checking baggage status and accessing stored equipment - Baggage status now displayed in Camp Hub Company Status summary and Company Reports - Baggage inspection during muster now respects world state (skipped if baggage inaccessible) - Added 'Check Baggage' event that can trigger when baggage becomes available after travel - Moved baggage-related decisions to Decisions accordion for better organization
[FORMATION ASSIGNMENT FIX] - Fixed formation assignment system to properly detect player equipment tier (T1-T6) - T7+ commanders (Master at Arms and above) now correctly control their own party - Formation assignment now accurately reads player's actual equipped gear instead of using fallback logic
[CAMP HUB IMPROVEMENTS] - Added Recap section showing recent events and company status changes - Added Forecast section with upcoming events and predicted needs - Improved Company Status summary with baggage train availability indicator - Enhanced news reporting system with better event categorization
[DOCUMENTATION & POLISH] - Updated all feature documentation to reflect baggage train integration - Cleaned up abandoned features and stale development files - Improved tooltip system with better descriptions for all UI elements - Enhanced color scheme documentation for UI consistency
This update adds realistic logistics simulation and fixes formation assignment bugs reported by the community.
